summary: Natalee Holloway, an 18-year-old from Alabama, disappeared in Aruba in 2005 after graduating from high school. Her disappearance made big headlines, especially in the U.S. Joran van der Sloot, a Dutch national, is the main suspect. He has said different things over the years about what happened, even admitting to killing her, but her body has never been found. The case was closed and reopened several times, but no one was ever charged. In 2023, van der Sloot was sent to the U.S. to face trial for extortion and admitted to killing Holloway.
title: Disappearance of Natalee Holloway
